text.section: In this section, "manufacturer" has the meaning stated in § 5-131(a)(2) of this article.

If a law enforcement officer is killed or dies in the performance of duty, a law enforcement agency may transfer the handgun of the deceased officer to the next of kin of the deceased officer, if the requirements of Title 5, Subtitle 1 of this article relating to firearms applications are met.
